txt_en: Not he who has much is rich, but he who gives much.
txt_cn: 拥有的多并不算富有，给予的多才算富有。
author: Erich Fromm

txt_en: Life is not merely being alive, but being well.
txt_cn: 生活不只是活着，而是精彩地活着。
author: Marcus Valerius Martialis

txt_en: It always seems impossible until it's done.
txt_cn: 事情未成功之前，总看似不可能完成。
author: Nelson Mandela

txt_en: I truly believe there's always a solution to every problem.
txt_cn: 我确信，每个问题都有解决方案。
author: Maira Kalman

txt_en: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
txt_cn: 掌握命运的是我们自己，而不是天上的星星。
author: William Shakespeare

txt_en: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
txt_cn: 我从未梦想成功，我只向着成功努力。
author: Estée Lauder
